text: Hi! Good morning!
Good morning!  How are you doing today?
I am good! I am trying to get my friends and others to donate their payment from this task to Save the Children. Save the Children is reputable and every dollar they raise goes to feed families.
What else can you tell me about the charity?  Which countries do they work in?
Save the Children works for 18 countries in Africa, 5 countries in the Middle East and India and Pakistan.
How much of a donation would one have to make to feed a family for a week?
5.00 a week would feed one family for a week. Do you spend 5.00 a week on a coffee?
That's crazy! I spend more than that on coffee every week!
Then would you be willing to donate all of the money you make on this hit to the organization? You could always donate more. It is our moral responsibility to help feed the hungry.
I would do that

That's awesome! We are so lucky to live in a country where there is help available to us such as Medicaid, food banks and other organizations to help us. It is so unfair that any person in any country can go hungry,
We really are.  We have SO many places to go to for help
Yes, we do. I hope that each of us can make a conscious decision to start donating some of our paychecks each week to help children and families around the world.
I'm going to tell more people about the charity
That is great!! That is what we need! Do you live in the United States?
Yes, I do
Me too! I am going to Kenya in December and I may try to see if there is anywhere there that I can donate some money. Wait, I should just go through Save the Children since I know they are reputable.
I always prefer going through organizations I have researched to make sure they're reputable as well
Exactly! Well, it was nice to meet you and thank you for agreeing to donate today!
Thank you, have a great day!
